trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Arvada
There were no other sightings in Arvada on or around July 18th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsAt band practice came outside after practice, we all witnessed the yellowish orange globe moving accross the sky. then it came back about 10 mins later. When I turned on my camera and the flash came on, the object went black. You could still see it but it was black now. It was a little above tree top level. It faded into the sky as it moved further away. I worked for a mojor airline and this was very strange indeed.
